ch0140_11_sakaki/0101_0701_01_10:
Well, well. Thanks for coming all this way to
greet me, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0140_11_sakaki/0101_0701_02_10:
There’s nothing you can do to stop me, Giovanni,
from conducting my evil schemes.
ch0140_11_sakaki/7101_0701_01_10: I act for the sole purpose of getting what I want...
ch0140_11_sakaki/7101_0701_02_10: Even if doing so harms you and your friends.
ch0140_11_sakaki/7102_0701_01_10: Ultra Beasts are Pokémon from another world.
ch0140_11_sakaki/7102_0701_02_10:
They have powers that are different than those of
the Pokémon from our world.
ch0140_11_sakaki/7102_0701_03_10: Heh. We’ve acquired a nice tool indeed.
ch0140_11_sakaki/7103_0701_02_10: It can’t sit still unless it’s eating something.
ch0140_11_sakaki/7103_0701_03_10: Therefore, I’ve decided to help it fulfill that desire.
ch0140_11_sakaki/7103_0701_04_10: If you truly care for Pokémon, don’t interfere.
ch0140_11_sakaki/7104_0701_01_10:
You’re free to follow me around, but do
be careful.
ch0140_11_sakaki/7104_0701_02_10:
You wouldn’t want to find yourself in
Guzzlord’s mouth.
ch0140_11_sakaki/7104_0701_03_10:
Even I would struggle to sleep at night if that
happened.
ch0140_11_sakaki/7105_0701_02_10:
However, you’re still inexperienced. You know
nothing of the adult world.
ch0140_11_sakaki/7105_0701_03_10:
One simply cannot take control of the world with
the power of justice and a pure heart.
ch0140_11_sakaki/1701_0701_01_10:
You can have this. What? It’s nothing to be
wary of.
ch0140_11_sakaki/1701_0702_01_10:
You should be grateful when so generously offered
a gift.
ch0140_11_sakaki/2501_0701_02_10:
Here on Pasio, some people are trying to coexist
with the Ultra Beasts.
ch0140_11_sakaki/2501_0701_04_10:
Is that even possible? I suppose it would be
interesting to watch.
ch0140_11_sakaki/2501_0702_01_10:
Do you think you could coexist with my
Team Rocket?
ch0140_11_sakaki/2501_0702_02_10:
People with evil in their heart are far more
difficult to deal with than any Pokémon. Heh...
ch0140_11_sakaki/2511_0701_02_10:
Once you get what you want, you immediately
want something else.
ch0140_11_sakaki/2511_0701_03_10:
Human greed knows no bounds...just like my
Guzzlord’s appetite.
ch0140_11_sakaki/2511_0701_04_10:
I suppose once I control the world, I’ll want
something else, too.
ch0140_11_sakaki/2511_0702_03_10: One day, I hope you show me all your ambitions.
ch0140_11_sakaki/3001_0701_01_10:
Keeping tabs on me this early in the day? Hmph.
A wasted effort...
ch0140_11_sakaki/3003_0701_01_10:
Another calm, peaceful day on this island...
For now.
ch0140_11_sakaki/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s a quiet night. Perfect for planning my next
move...
